attributes.action: Stop essay writing services for students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you aware that students can purchase undergraduate and post-graduate essays online? This sort of thing undermines the whole university system and allows students to gain a degree they have done no work for and know little about - this is potentially dangerous for certain professions and devalues degrees so that they are virtually worthless. Websites offering model answers and essay writing services must be stopped.
